svg.title: Data Flow Diagram Template (Neon Cyber AI Style)
svg.desc:
This SVG file serves as a template for data flow diagrams in a "Neon Cyber AI" style. Expected elements: - **Color Palette**: Similar to the architecture diagram â€“ dark background with vibrant neon accents. - **Nodes**: Representing data sources, processing units, or data sinks (e.g., Isaac Sim, VSLAM Node, Nvblox Node, Nav2 Planner, Robot Controller, Synthetic Dataset). Geometric shapes with glowing outlines. - **Edges/Arrows**: Emphasize direction of data flow with glowing, possibly animated arrows. Can indicate specific ROS 2 topics. - **Text**: Clear, concise labels for data types or topics, in neon fonts. - **Effects**: Flowing gradients along paths, subtle particle effects to represent data packets, background grid. - **Overall Feel**: Dynamic, showing continuous movement and transformation of data within the AI-Robot Brain.
This diagram should illustrate the flow of data (e.g., sensor streams, pose estimates, maps, control commands) between the various components identified in the `data-model.md` and `ros2_interfaces.md`.
